name: help {command}
value: gives an example on how to use it

name: search
value: gives a list of results when given an `{type}["anime", "manga", "person", "character"]` `{title}[STRING]`

name: top
value:
gives a list of results when given an `{type}["anime", "manga", "people", "characters"]`

`{subtype}{Manga: ["manga", "novels", "oneshots", "doujin", "manhwa", "manhua", "bypopularity", "favorite"]`

`Anime: ["airing", "upcoming", "tv", "movie", "ova", "special", "bypopularity", "favorite"]}`

name: season
value:
gives a list of results when given an `{year}[INTGER]`
`{season}["spring", "summer", "fall", "winter"]`

name: genre
value:
gives a list of results when given an `{type}["anime", "manga"]`

`{genre}{Manga: ["Action", "Adventure", "Cars", "Comedy", "Dementia", "Demons", "Mystery", "Drama", "Ecchi", "Fantasy", "Game", "Hentai", "Historical", "Horror", "Kids", "Magic", "Martial_Arts", "Mecha", "Music", "Parody", "Samurai", "Romance", "School", "Sci_Fi", "Shoujo", "Shoujo_Ai", "Shounen", "Shounen_Ai", "Space", "Sports", "Super_Power", "Vampire", "Yaoi", "Yuri", "Harem", "Slice_Of_Life", "Supernatural", "Military", "Police", "Psychological", "Seinen", "Josei", "Doujinshi", "Gender_Bender", "Thriller"]'

'Anime: ["Action", "Adventure", "Cars", "Comedy", "Dementia", "Demons", "Mystery", "Drama", "Ecchi", "Fantasy", "Game", "Hentai", "Historical", "Horror", "Kids", "Magic", "Martial_Arts", "Mecha", "Music", "Parody", "Samurai", "Romance", "School", "Sci_Fi", "Shoujo", "Shoujo_Ai", "Shounen", "Shounen_Ai", "Space", "Sports", "Super_Power", "Vampire", "Yaoi", "Yuri", "Harem", "Slice_Of_Life", "Supernatural", "Military", "Police", "Psychological", "Thriller", "Seinen", "Josei"]}`

search:
m! search anime Naruto | This would result in a list of anime that matches the search of "Naruto"

m! search character Subaru | This would result in a list of characters that matches the search of "Subaru"
anime: m! anime 1 | This would result in the anime with an ID of 1
manga: m! manga 1 | This would result in the manga with an ID of 1
character: m! character 1 | This would result in the character with an ID of 1
person: m! person 1 | This would result in the person with an ID of 1
top:
m! top anime airing | This would result in a list of top anime that are currently airing

m! top character | This would result in a list of top characters
season: m! season 2018 winter | This would result in a list of anime that aired in Winter of 2018
genre:
m! genre anime action | This would result in a list of anime that have the "Action" as a genre

m! genre manga game | This would result in a list of manga that have the "Game" as a genre
